name: Zuzalu Coast Ride Briefing
description:
Hi Zuzalans -

We are taking roughly 30 minutes to talk through the Zuzalu Coastride 2023 weekend adventure we will be having May 20 - 21. We are taking a weekend in Dubrovnik, Croatia and there will be two groups: Cyclists and Non-Cyclists.

Agenda:
1. Inspiration Overview & Background (Art & Lori)

2. Bike Logistics (Art)
3. Transport Logistics (Lori)

4. AirBnb (Lori)

5. Talk through Program (Lori + Atilla)

6. Cost Breakdown (Lori + Alex)
7. Questions

Program for reference:
https://www.canva.com/design/DAFjKQagaD4/-DhmSzumE3GviVTQYz4Ppg/view
